snippet: The University of Oregon says three basketball players accused of sexually assaulting another student will not return to the team.
abstract: Three University of Oregon basketball players accused of sexually assaulting a fellow student in March have been suspended and will not return to the team; University had delayed suspending Brandon Austin, Damyean Dotson and Dominic Artis until after police completed criminal investigation.
lead_paragraph: The University of Oregon says three basketball players accused of sexually assaulting another student will not return to the team.

headline.main: 3 Suspended in Oregon Sexual Assault Case
headline.print_headline: 3 Oregon Players Suspended in Sexual Assault Case
